Post.title: PHP_APP_RSA_AES
Post._content:
## app##

##  ##

1. `lib_aes.php` aes
2. `server_rsa_crypt.php` RSA
3. `client_rsa_crypt.php` RSA

 <!-- more -->

,exapmle

- -`service_client_exchange.php`
- :- `client_generate_aeskey.php`

- 
   -`service_decrypt_client_001.php`

- ..-`client_decrypt_server.php`

[][1]
----

And So on...


  [1]: https://github.com/tuber/PHP_APP_RSA_AES

Post.title: jp2aascii
Post._content:
##  ##
<iframe height=498 width=510 src='http://player.youku.com/embed/XMTgyODIyMjA3Mg==' frameborder=0 'allowfullscreen'></iframe>

<!-- more -->

##  ##

```
#!/bin/bash
make
jp2a --color --background=light -b -f --term-fit  waimai.jpg >waimai.txt
cat waimai.txt
sleep 2
make clean >/dev/null 2>&1
jp2a --color --background=light -b -f --term-fit zaiyiqilvse.jpg >zaiyiqi.txt
cat zaiyiqi.txt

```

##  ##

jp2aphpb
sh
Post.raw:
---
title: jp2aascii
date: 2016-11-21 10:05:49
categories: LINUX
tags:
 - jp2a
 - ascii
 - meituan
---

##  ##
<iframe height=498 width=510 src='http://player.youku.com/embed/XMTgyODIyMjA3Mg==' frameborder=0 'allowfullscreen'></iframe>

<!-- more -->

##  ##

```
#!/bin/bash
make
jp2a --color --background=light -b -f --term-fit  waimai.jpg >waimai.txt
cat waimai.txt
sleep 2
make clean >/dev/null 2>&1
jp2a --color --background=light -b -f --term-fit zaiyiqilvse.jpg >zaiyiqi.txt
cat zaiyiqi.txt

```

##  ##

jp2aphpb
sh

Post.title: PHP
ubuntuPHP7
Post._content:
## php ##

`apt-get autoremove php*`

##  ##

```
apt-get install software-properties-common
add-apt-repository ppa:ondrej/php
apt-get update
```

## php ##

 <!-- more -->

```
apt-get install php-common php-cli php-fpm php-mysql php-gd php-dev php-zip php-pear php-curl php-mbstring

```

##  ##


`/etc/init.d/php7.0-fpm` php7.0fpm

```
root@lyh:/etc/init.d# /etc/init.d/php7.0-fpm status[start stop]
php7.0-fpm start/running, process 1704

```


- `/etc/php/7.0/fpm/php-fpm.conf`

  `pid = /run/php/php7.0-fpm.pid`

- `/etc/php/7.0/fpm/pool.d/www.conf`

  `listen = /run/php/php7.0-fpm.sock`

- `/etc/nginx/sites-enabled`yoursite.conf

  `fastcgi_pass unix:/var/run/php/php7.0-fpm.sock;`

## PHP-v ##

```
root@lyh:/etc/php/7.0/fpm# php -v
PHP 7.0.13-1+deb.sury.org~trusty+1 (cli) ( NTS )
Copyright (c) 1997-2016 The PHP Group
Zend Engine v3.0.0, Copyright (c) 1998-2016 Zend Technologies
    with Zend OPcache v7.0.13-1+deb.sury.org~trusty+1, Copyright (c) 1999-2016, by Zend Technologies

```
